name: Downhill Supreme 2
description:
Discover the thrilling, addictive and action packed sequel of Nr.1 extreme cycling game: Downhill Supreme 2!

Take off a huge jumps, balance in mid-air, hop over rock section and hope to cross the finish line unscaved. This is the thrilling world of Downhill Supreme 2. Your skills will be tested to their maximum with challenging yet fun 60 detailed levels in three locations. Master the art of downhill cycling and see how fast can you go. Have you got what it takes to be the Nr.1?

It’s addictive, it’s action-packed its the game you need to have!

Features:
- 60 amazing levels varying from easy to technical.
- Stunning Bike Builder that lets you build your dream bike! Real brands, real deal!
- Riders customisation with your favorite racing kit and equipment.
- Tilt, Joystick and Button Controls. Have fun the way you like it!
- Amazing physics with stamina and impact simulations.
- Master the techniques to be the fastest down the mountain.

Can you be the fastest?

Other Features:
- Dedicated online leaderboard.
- Your best run replays.
- Online Events with real world prizes.
- Rider oriented graphics.
